---
name: Bug report
about: Report a bug in the modpack or a mod included with it. Please include modloader, Minecraft version, modpack version, and logs.
title: "[BUG] "
labels: bug
assignees: []
---

Thank you for taking the time to report a bug! Please fill out the sections below as completely as possible.

## Required information

- **Modloader & version** (e.g., NeoForge 21.1.213):
- **Minecraft version** (e.g., 1.21.1):
- **Modpack version**:

## Describe the bug

A clear and concise description of what the bug is.

## To Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior: (Provide as specific steps as possible)
1.
2.
3.

## Expected behavior

What you expected to happen.

## Logs and crash reports

- Please upload your logs or crash reports to a public paste service and paste links here. Recommended services: GitHub Gist, Pastebin, or mclo.gs.
- Provide links to the following when available:
  - `latest.log` or `logs/` (link to paste/gist)
  - `crash-*.txt` (link to paste/gist), if present

Example:

- latest.log: https://gist.github.com/your-gist
- crash report: https://mclo.gs/your-crash

If you are unsure how to get logs or a gist, include a note and we'll help.

## Additional context
Add any other context about the problem here (e.g., other mods present, mods recently added/removed, steps you already tried).

## Reproduction checklist (helpful, not required)

- [ ] I tested with the latest version of the modpack
- [ ] I removed any non-default mods (if applicable) to see if the issue persists
- [ ] I can reproduce this consistently

Please do NOT paste large logs directly in the issue body; use a paste/gist link instead.
